title: Magnolia cms Gmail configuration?
body:
Here are the steps for dummies:

  1. Back in Magnolia, go to your user profile and provide an email. That’s where the test email will be sent to (see step 7) /admincentral#app:security:systemUsers;/:treeview:
  2. Back in your Gmail account: settings: allow IMAP
  3. Back in Magnolia, go to the mail app: /admincentral#app:mail:main;
  4. Add your SMTP settings (auth via SSL worked for me) as described here (see resources section)
  5. Always in Magnolia, try to send a test email: /admincentral#app:mail:verify;
  6. Back in your Gmail account: receive that warning email from Google (see screenshot) & follow the link in that email to allow "less safe apps"
  7. Back in Magnolia, try to send a test email again /admincentral#app:mail:verify;
  8. Voila :)

Note: the /admin/* are the url path to jump directly to the relevant section of admin central, this is only informative & hopefully will help you save time.
